description:
Rip around running errands and exploring local bike paths with this fun and comfortable ride. For riders that come from the world of mountain bikes, the Treadwell 3 will feel instantly familiar. Stable geometry promotes an ergonomic, upright riding position. Big smooth rolling Maxxis tires have great grip on bike lanes and trails. Smart technology on the wheel sensor pairs with a ride app to give you ride data (speed, distance, calories) plus info about your carbon offset and reminds you when your bike needs service.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame and chromoly fork, with relaxed geometry
  • Step-through frame makes mounting and dismounting easy
  • Urban Amor bumpers protect from against dents and scuffs
  • 7-speed drivetrain pairs a 38T chain ring with a 11-34T cassette
  • MicroSHIFT components with an alloy Prowheel crank
  • Promax mechanical disc brakes
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • Wide, ergonomic seat is quilted for comfort
  • Wheel sensor pairs with free Cannondale app, and uses Garmin™ technology to record ride data
  • Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Treadwell 3 Remixte Bicycle - Unisex
